metadata.subject: Publishers and publishing
metadata.title: Mémoire a consulter pour le Sieur Guyot
metadata.creator: Guyot,M.(Joseph Nicolas),1728-1816,
Guyot, M. (Joseph Nicolas), 1728-1816, supposed author
Desaint, Catherine (Chaucat)
Guyot, Pierre Jean Jacques Guillaume, supposed author
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 8 no. 105
metadata.description: Caption title. Imprint at foot of p. 12

Relating to a legal dispute between Catherine Chaucat (widow of the publisher Nicolas Desaint) and Guyot over the publication rights of Répertoire universel & raisonné de jurisprudence civile, criminelle, canonique & bénéficiale, the editorship of which is acribed either to Joseph Nicolas Guyot or to Pierre Jean Jacques Guillaume Guyot
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
